title: About TripChoice
body:
# About TripChoice

## Plan less. Travel more.

We believe travel should be simple, honest, and unforgettable. Founded with the vision of making quality travel accessible to everyone, TripChoice curates exceptional travel experiences at transparent prices.

### Our Promise
- **Honest Pricing**: No hidden costs, no surprises
- **Curated Experiences**: Handpicked destinations and activities
- **Local Expertise**: Deep knowledge of every destination
- **24/7 Support**: We're here for you throughout your journey

### Why Choose Us?

**Authentic Experiences**: We partner with local experts to create genuine cultural immersions.

**Sustainable Travel**: We prioritize eco-friendly practices and support local communities.

**Personalized Service**: Every trip is tailored to your preferences and budget.

**Quality Assurance**: We visit every destination and verify every experience ourselves.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
body:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Booking & Payments

**Q: How do I book a trip?**
A: Simply WhatsApp us with your preferred destination and dates. We'll send you a customized itinerary within 30 minutes!

**Q: What payment methods do you accept?**
A: We accept UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and wallet payments. Full payment required at booking.

**Q: Can I modify my booking?**
A: Yes, modifications are possible up to 7 days before travel with applicable charges.

## Travel Documents

**Q: Do you handle visas?**
A: Yes, we assist with visa applications for international destinations. Additional service charges apply.

**Q: What insurance is included?**
A: Basic travel insurance is included in all packages. Premium coverage available as add-on.

## Cancellation Policy

**Q: What is your cancellation policy?**
A: Free cancellation up to 7 days before travel. 50% charges apply for 3-7 days, no refunds within 72 hours.

**Q: Can I get a refund if I cancel?**
A: Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days after deducting applicable cancellation charges.
